title: Looking for clan
body:
Hi all
Looking for clan of active/semi active players that i can join for Ranked, Normals or aram on a regular basis, No too concerned about level of players just looking for a group to have fun with. Summoner Name kronos0304

replies.body: Thank you, i have signed up.

www.zealotgaming.com

Lots of active OCE members and they have a League of Legends Gamenight once a week. 90% of them are really cool people aswell who are always keen for a match.
